column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////After giving Bavette's another chance
column2: I have no other option but to give them a raving review. The host/hostess problem that I had encountered on my 3 previous attempts to enjoy Bavette's has been fixed with the most wonderful young man with large granny glasses and a huge smile! He was a breathe of fresh air after preparing myself for the worst. The server was fantastic and the food was mind blowing! Our table ordered oysters
